title: Coachella Unveils 2025 Lineup
description: The 2025 Coachella lineup features Lady Gaga, Green Day, Post Malone, and Travis Scott alongside Charli XCX, Missy Elliott, Megan Thee Stallion, Kraftwerk, and more. Coachella Unveils 2025 Lineup Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: The 2025 Coachella lineup features Lady Gaga, Green Day, Post Malone, and Travis Scott alongside Charli XCX, Missy Elliott, Megan Thee Stallion, Kraftwerk, and more.
text: Coachella has unveiled its 2025 lineup. Alongside headliners Lady Gaga, Green Day, Post Malone, and Travis Scott, the Indio, California music festival features an impressive undercard led by Charli XCX, Missy Elliott, Megan Thee Stallion, Kraftwerk, The Original Misfits, BLACKPINK members LISA and JENNIE (each performing solo), Portishead’s Beth Gibbons, FKA twigs, Clairo, The Prodigy, Basement Jaxx, and The Marías. Other notable acts include The Go-Go’s, Three 6 Mafia, Anitta, Zedd, Gustavo Dudamel with the LA Philharmonic, Japanese Breakfast, Darkside, Amyl & the Sniffers, beabadoobee, Mustard, T-Pain, Arca, Rema, ENHYPEN, Shaboozey, Miike Snow, Jimmy Eat World, Circle Jerks, Djo, Yo Gabba Gabbaa!, Snow Strippers, A.G. Cook, Fcukers, Blonde Redhead, Kneecap, and Wisp, among others. Check out Coachella’s 2025 lineup poster below. Get Coachella 2025 Tickets Here Coachella 2025 is set to take place over two weekends, April 11th-13th and 18th-20th. A ticket pre-sale will begin Friday, November 22nd beginning at 11:00 a.m. PT  via the festival’s website. GA passes start at $599, while VIP pass start at $1,399. Those who attended the festival in 2023 and 2024 will get priority access to purchase tickets and registration for the pre-sale is now ongoing. Get more tickets details here. For those unable to attend in person, Coachella 2025 will be streamed live on YouTube.
html:
Coachella has unveiled its 2025 lineup. Alongside headliners Lady Gaga, Green Day, Post Malone, and Travis Scott, the Indio, California music festival features an impressive undercard led by Charli XCX, Missy Elliott, Megan Thee Stallion, Kraftwerk, The Original Misfits, BLACKPINK members LISA and JENNIE (each performing solo), Portishead’s Beth Gibbons, FKA twigs, Clairo, The Prodigy, Basement Jaxx, and The Marías.

Other notable acts include The Go-Go’s, Three 6 Mafia, Anitta, Zedd, Gustavo Dudamel with the LA Philharmonic, Japanese Breakfast, Darkside, Amyl & the Sniffers, beabadoobee, Mustard, T-Pain, Arca, Rema, ENHYPEN, Shaboozey, Miike Snow, Jimmy Eat World, Circle Jerks, Djo, Yo Gabba Gabbaa!, Snow Strippers, A.G. Cook, Fcukers, Blonde Redhead, Kneecap, and Wisp, among others. Check out Coachella’s 2025 lineup poster below.

Get Coachella 2025 Tickets Here

Coachella 2025 is set to take place over two weekends, April 11th-13th and 18th-20th. A ticket pre-sale will begin Friday, November 22nd beginning at 11:00 a.m. PT  via the festival’s website. GA passes start at $599, while VIP pass start at $1,399. Those who attended the festival in 2023 and 2024 will get priority access to purchase tickets and registration for the pre-sale is now ongoing. Get more tickets details here.

For those unable to attend in person, Coachella 2025 will be streamed live on YouTube.
